name: Explorer Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:Earthy & Woody.Scent Type:Earthy Greens & Herbs.Key Notes:Bergamot, Vetiver, Patchouli.Fragrance Description:Introducing Explorer from Montblanc. This unconventional woody aromatic leather Eau de Parfum reveals a fresh green Italian bergamot, contrasted with a powerful vetiver from Haiti, and combined with rich and exclusive patchouli from Indonesia.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat. (SD Alcohol 39-C), Parfum (Fragrance), Aqua (Water), Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane,  Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Bht, Citral, Limonene, Geraniol, Linalool, Ci 14700 (Red 4), Ci 42090 (Blue 1), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Spray on pulse points: behind the ears and on your wrists... Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Mont Blanc Explorer EDP is an olfactory journey worth embarking on. With its sophisticated blend of citrusy bergamot, earthy vetiver, and smoky patchouli, this cologne evokes a sense of adventure and refinement. The opening notes burst with freshness, gradually mellowing into a warm, woody base that lingers throughout the day. Its versatility makes it suitable for both formal occasions and casual outings. Overall, Mont Blanc Explorer EDP is a timeless fragrance that embodies the spirit of exploration and elegance. My boyfriend loves this new fragrance!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: MONTBLANC EXPLORER is more than just a cologne; it's a captivating odyssey that embodies sophistication and allure. The initial notes greet you with a burst of freshness, reminiscent of a crisp mountain breeze. As it settles, the warm and woody undertones add depth, creating a harmonious balance that lingers throughout the day.  What sets EXPLORER apart is its versatility u2013 equally suited for a day at the office or a night out. The bottle itself is a work of art, paying homage to European craftsmanship with its solid shape and timeless design. It embodies the essence of masculinity and adventure, serving as a fitting vessel for such an extraordinary scent. Overall, Montblanc Explorer Eau de Parfum is a masterpiece that captures the essence of exploration and discovery. It's a scent for the modern adventurer, ready to conquer new challenges and embrace the unknown.

reviews.review_text: Hey Beauties!   Explorers know it well; adventure has no limits. Once you have climbed a new summit, you start thinking of the next challenge. Like an irresistible call. The splendor of unexplored landscapes and the true nature of man. Introducing Explorer, the fragrance from Montblanc.   This unconventional woody aromatic leather Eau de Parfum reveals a fresh green Italian bergamot, contrasted with a powerful vetiver from Haiti and combined with rich and exclusive patchouli from Indonesia.   The Explorer bottle pays tribute to European craftsmanship through the expertise and heritage of the Maison Montblanc. Resolutely masculine, its solid shape evokes timeless strength and the true spirit of exploration.  Fragrance Category: Woody, Leathery, Aromatic  Fragrance Notes: Top Note~ Bergamot  Middle Note~ Vetiver  Bottom Note~ Patchouli  This cologne is extremely rugged and manly. This is the perfect scent for the man in your life who enjoys wearing a scent that truly defines being a man. One who's strong and tough and can do it all. He's the one who can accomplish the roughest and toughest plights and enjoys doing it. I quite enjoy the way it smells. I feel a little goes a long way. This scent is very long wearing, so there's no need for your guy to worry about constant reappilcation.   Products Shown: @MontBlanc~ Explorer Cologne

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Montblanc Explorer has an amazing aroma to it. It smells fresh, yet musky and masculine. The fragrance opens with fresh and zesty top notes of bergamot, clary sage, and pink pepper, which give way to earthy vetiver, leather, and patchouli. Finally, the base notes of ambroxan, akigalawood, and cacao add an intriguing twist to the fragrance, leaving a lasting and memorable trail. The scent lasts a long time and doesnu2019t fade like a lot of other colognes. Honestly, all I want to do is smell my boyfriend when heu2019s wearing this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recently had the opportunity to try the Montblanc Explorer cologne, and I am very impressed! I'll admit, I'm not the best when it comes to describing scents, but there's something about this cologne that both my wife and I find incredibly captivating. The scent is undeniably pleasing and carries an attractive aura with it. It's a perfect balance of sophistication and a hint of playfulness, making it suitable for any occasion. Whether you're going out for a formal event or simply want to feel confident and alluring throughout the day, this cologne has got you covered. One thing that I particularly appreciate about this cologne is its packaging. The bottle itself has a substantial feel to it, with a unique design that stands out from other colognes on the market. It looks great on our countertop. Furthermore, I think this cologne would make an exceptional gift. Its sophisticated scent make it a perfect choice for loved ones in need of a little luxury and self-indulgence
